emailValid: The email of the user must be valid and unique!
passValid: For security reasons, new the password of the user must be minimum 8 characters, must contains at least 1 letter and 1 number!
editUser: Edit the data of the user
firstNameValid: The first name of the user must be at least 3 letters and must not contains numbers!
lastNameValid: The last name of the user must be at least 3 letters and must not contains numbers!
roleValid: The role number of the user must be 1 (viewer), 2(archiver) or 3(administrator)!
passValid2: Only the encrypted password is stored for security reasons. When you add a new password of the user must be minimum 7 characters, must contains at least 1 letter and 1 number! Before save the password will be automatically encrypted.
editEntry: Edit the data of the entry
hungarianValid: The question in Hungarian must consist of at least 3 letters
englishValid: The English question must contain at least 3 letters
hungarianAnswerValid: The Hungarian answer must be at least 2 letters long
englishAnswerValid: The English answer must be at least 3 letters long and must not contain numbers
descriptionHungarianValid: The Hungarian explanation must be at least 3 letters long and must not contain numbers!
descriptionEnglishValid: The English explanation must consist of at least 3 letters and must not contain numbers!
updateEntry: Update the data of the entry
updatequestion: Update the data of the question
loginEmail: The email of the user must be valid and unique!
loginPassword: For security reasons, the password of the user must be minimum 8 characters, must contains at least 1 letter and 1 number!

FIZZINGBRAIN.SELECT: Please select the language of the application!
FIZZINGBRAIN.BUTTONTITLE: It is up to you to choose the difficulty level!
FIZZINGBRAIN.EASY: Easy (The computer is more wrong than usual)
FIZZINGBRAIN.IMPOSSIBLE: Impossible (the computer does a better job of guessing than you)
FIZZINGBRAIN.RANDOMLEVEL: I do feel lucky, ya punk! (The computer chooses a level for you.)
FIZZINGBRAIN.PACKERROR: The number of pack of questions are not right.
FIZZINGBRAIN.DRAW: We have reached the end of the game. A DRAW has been reached.
FIZZINGBRAIN.COMPUTERWINS: We have reached the end of the game. It is the COMPUTER that wins.
FIZZINGBRAIN.PLAYERWINS: We have reached the end of the game. A win has been achieved by the player.
FIZZINGBRAIN.BOTHGETPOINT: Both guesses were equally good. BOTH PLAYERS get points.
FIZZINGBRAIN.COMPUTERGETSPOINT: The COMPUTER guess was better. It gets points.
FIZZINGBRAIN.PLAYERGETSPOINT: The PLAYER's guess was better. He/She gets points.
FIZZINGBRAIN.PLACEHOLDER: You can write your guess here...
FIZZINGBRAIN.Question: Question

HEADBAR.SELECT: Please select the language of the application!

aim.title: The aim of the game
aim.description: The idea of Fizzingbrain is that the user and the computer fight a guessing duel.

difficulty.title: The level of difficulty
difficulty.description: The program allows you to choose the level of difficulty, which affects the time to answer the questions and the accuracy of the computer's guessing.

score.title: The score
score.description: The program scores the guesses based on the absolute value of the guesses and gives points to the one who is closest to the solution. If they both hit the correct solution, they both get a point. For each question answered correctly, 5 points are awarded.

end.title: End of one match
end.description: The game ends after 6 questions and the program will declare a winner on the basis of the points scored: in case of a tie, the program will declare a draw.
